documentation: # Monday.com This guide walks you through setting up the Monday.com integration within Boltic. ## Prerequisites To set up the Monday.com integration, you'll need: - A Monday.com account If you don't have a Monday.com account, you can create one at Monday.com. ## Setting Up the Monday.com Integration in Boltic 1. **Create an API Token** - Log into your Monday.com account - Visit the Monday Developer Center - Click on "My Access Tokens" in the left sidebar - Click "Generate New Token" - Copy and securely store your API token 2. **Log into Boltic** - Log into your Boltic account or navigate to the Boltic Open Source dashboard 3. **Navigate to Integrations** - Click on `Sources` in the navigation menu - Click on `+ Add New source` 4. **Select Source Type** - On the Set up the source page, search for `Monday` in the search bar - Select Monday.com from the results 5. **Configure Integration** - **Name:** Enter a descriptive name for your Monday.com integration - **API Token:** Paste the API token you generated earlier - **Workspace:** Select the workspace you want to connect 6. **Additional Details (Optional)** - **Tags:** Add relevant tags for better organization - **Description:** Provide a brief description of the integration's purpose 7. **Test and Save Integration** - Click `Test Connection` to verify your API token and settings - If successful, click `Set up source` to complete the configuration ## Support If you need assistance, please contact Boltic support or visit our Support Documentation.
